010package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
011
012/**
013 * This is a utility class with static methods for gamma correction
014 * used by LabColorSpace and LuvColorSpace color spaces.
015 * Implemented with double values for better accuracy.
016 * Should be modified to implement a a subclass of ColorSpace.
017 * TODO: duplicate in lib.color? add JavaDoc!
018 */
019public abstract class sRgbUtil {
020        
021        private sRgbUtil() {}
022        
023        // specs according to official sRGB standard:
024        private static final double s = 12.92;
025        private static final double a0 = 0.0031308;
026        private static final double b0 = s * a0;        // 0.040449936
027        private static final double d = 0.055;
028        private static final double gamma = 2.4;
029        
030        /**
031         * Forward Gamma correction (from linear to non-linear component values) for sRGB.
032         * 
033         * @param lc linear component value in [0,1]
034         * @return gamma-corrected (non-linear) component value
035         */
036    public static double gammaFwd(double lc) {
037                return (lc <= a0) ?
038                        (lc * s) :
039                        ((1 + d) * Math.pow(lc, 1 / gamma) - d);
040    }
041    
042    /**
043         * Inverse Gamma correction (from non-linear to linear component values) for sRGB.
044         * 
045         * @param nc non-linear (Gamma-corrected) component value in [0,1]
046         * @return linear component value
047         */
048    public static double gammaInv(double nc) {
049        return (nc <= b0) ?
050                (nc / s) :
051                        Math.pow((nc + d) / (1 + d), gamma);
052    }
053    
054        public static float[] sRgbToRgb(float[] srgb) { // all components in [0,1]
055                float R = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[0]);
056                float G = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[1]);
057                float B = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[2]);
058                return new float[] { R, G, B };
059        }
060
061        public static float[] rgbToSrgb(float[] rgb) { // all components in [0,1]
062                float sR = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[0]);
063                float sG = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[1]);
064                float sB = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[2]);
065                return new float[] { sR, sG, sB };
066        }
067    
068    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
069        
070//      public static void main(String[] args) {
071//              Random rg = new Random();
072//              for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
073//                      double lc = rg.nextDouble();
074//                      double nc = gammaFwd(lc);
075//                      System.out.format(Locale.US, "lc = %.8f,  nc = %.8f, check = %.8f\n", lc, nc, lc-gammaInv(nc));
076//              }
077//              System.out.println("" + (s * a0));
078//
079//      }
080    
081}
